text: Dave "Compact Dynamo" Mackintosh is the drummer for the power metal band DragonForce. The band changed their genre to 'Extreme Power Metal' after Dave started playing in the band. Dave does extreme metal drumming in DragonForce's music, such as blast beats. Category:Living people Category:DragonForce Category:English drummers Category:1970 births Category:Musicians from Glasgow
title: Dave Mackintosh
